en.title: Scoring websites the way I score films
en.excerpt: Pairing custom sound design with subtle interactions to shape mood-driven websites.
en.body:
To match the emotional arc of my film projects, every website begins with a short musical motif. The melody becomes a guide for scroll fades, hover dynamics, and the pacing of component reveals.

I build adjustable sound layers with Tone.js and the Web Audio API so visitors are welcomed by ambient textures. A control panel lets them mute the sound or switch to a lighter mix when needed.

This note breaks the process into concept, mixing, and front-end implementation, and includes Ableton and React snippets from recent launches.

zh.title: 像配樂一樣為網站編曲
zh.excerpt: 結合客製音景與互動節奏，打造以情緒為核心的網站體驗。
zh.body:
為了讓網站呈現出與影像同樣的情緒，我習慣先寫一段短的音樂主題。這段旋律會成為互動節奏的參考，無論是滾動時的淡入淡出，或是按鈕 hover 的強弱都會對應音軌起伏。

接著我會以 Tone.js 與 Web Audio API 建立可調整的聲音層，讓訪客在進入網站時獲得環境音的浸潤。如果使用者不喜歡音樂，也可以在控制面板中關閉，或者換成更輕量的聲響。

這篇筆記整理了我如何把配樂流程拆成三個階段：概念、混音與前端實作，並分享專案中的 Ableton 與 React 範例。
